meta.hint:
Some words are alike, but they have small differences in meaning. Those differences are called shades of meaning.
For example, think about the words stare, peek, and glare.
Word Definition
stare to look at something for a while
peek to look at something quickly
glare to look at something in an angry way
Stare, peek, and glare all mean to look at something, but in different ways.
meta.question: Choose the correct word from given related words.

content.extra: asking about something,  wondering about something
